page.title: 04CLASS FOUR
page.content: There are 19 boys and 13 girls aged 9- 11 in Class 4 of Anston Hillcrest Junior School.The average heights are 1.44m(girls) and 1.46m(boys).Only 13 were born to parents living in the village; all the rest have moved in from elsewhere. None of the parents were born in Anston. Of the 64 parents, 30 fathers and 21 mothers have jobs on 4/7/1985 - mainly in social class 2 occupations. 2 Dads are unemployed and 11 Mums are house wives. One family has a grandparent living with them and 4 have them in S. Anston. 2 families have no car, 20 have one, 8 have 2 and 2 families have 3. Every child owns a bike and 25 have a personal computer at home. 29 keep pets. 14 families had a foreign holiday in the last 12 months. Spain was the most popular destination(8), followed by France(4) and Greece(2).
